text: Siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo senaṃ gamanāya dirattatirattaṃ tena bhikkhunā senāya vasitabbaṃ
edit: Siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo senaṃ gamanāya dirattatirattaṃ tena bhikkhunā senāya vasitabbaṃ

translations.transtext: 49. There being some reason or another for a bhikkhu to go to an army, he may stay two or three (consecutive) nights with the army.
๔๙. ก็ถ้าปัจจัยบางอย่าง เพื่อจะไปสู่เสนามีแก่ภิกษุนั้นภิกษุนั้นพึงอยู่ได้ในเสนาเพียง ๒-๓ คืน
49. It may be that that bhikkhu has some reason for going to (visit) an army. Then that bhikkhu can stay with the army for two or three nights.
